StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: bowling champion
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was known far and wide for being the best bowler in [PAWN_possessive] homeland. [PAWN_pronoun] was considered the peak of athleticism by [PAWN_possessive] peers.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: petty criminal
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up, [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] time constantly committing heinous crimes such as going sixty-seven miles per hour (107.83 KMPH) in a forty-five mile per hour (72.42 KMPH) zone. Despite being a psychopath, he never actually saw the need to commit any serious crimes. Petty ones were just too fun!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: smart kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was considered one of the smartest kids in [PAWN_possessive] village. This constant lavishing of praise had strange effects on [PAWN_possessive] psyche.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: frog rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The marvels of genetic engineering across the galaxy has created specialized frogs capable of most any task or livestock niche. Naturally, this led to entire ranches dedicated to amphibian husbandry. [PAWN_nameDef] was such a rancher, owning and operating a ranch specializing in frogs. [PAWN_pronoun] raised many different species of frog, including some of the more exotic ones.
